title: Truth Behind Ballmer And "Linux Is A Cancer"
description:
If you've been in the Linux space for any length of time you've probably heard the Steve Ballmer quote "Linux is a cancer" but what if I told you this was only a fraction of the quote and the full quote is so much more interesting.
